nodes.text: A Daimanate flight commander was an officer in Sith Lord Daiman's starfighter corps during the Aquilaris campaign in 1032 BBY. During the final stages of the campaign, his starfighter was shot down by Kerra Holt who was flying a Fire Lotus-class starfighter she had borrowed from Jenn Devaad's Devil Squadron, a starfighter group within the pro-Republic Grace Command. Prior to his death, he communicated with Daiman and informed him of the Jedi attack on Aquilaris, a province of Daiman's fiefdom.
